PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-08981998-05-260,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS,  PMO,  SGC
PrecisAppointment of BARBARA HALL, of Toronto, Ontario, as Special Advisor to the Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada and to the Solicitor General of Canada, and National Chair, Steering Committee for the National Strategy on Community Safety and Crime Prevention, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
Attachments
precis:
Appointment of BARBARA HALL, of Toronto, Ontario, as Special Advisor to the
Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada and to the Solicitor
General of Canada, and National Chair, Steering Committee for the National
Strategy on Community Safety and Crime Prevention, to hold office during
pleasure for a term of two years.
